quotes.author: Elon Musk
quotes.text: When something is important enough, you do it even if the odds are not in your favor.

quotes.author: Winston Churchill
quotes.text: If you're going through hell, keep going.

quotes.author: Thomas A. Edison
quotes.text: Our greatest weakness lies in giving up. The most certain way to succeed is always to try just one more time.

quotes.author: Confucius
quotes.text: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.

quotes.author: Nelson Mandela
quotes.text: It always seems impossible until it's done.

quotes.author: St. Jerome
quotes.text: Good, better, best. Never let it rest. 'Til your good is better and your better is best.

quotes.author: Norman Vincent Peale
quotes.text: Believe in yourself! Have faith in your abilities! Without a humble but reasonable confidence in your own powers you cannot be successful or happy.

quotes.author: Charles R. Swindoll
quotes.text: Life is 10% what happens to you and 90% how you react to it.

quotes.author: Helen Keller
quotes.text: Optimism is the faith that leads to achievement. Nothing can be done without hope and confidence.

quotes.author: Walt Disney
quotes.text: If you can dream it, you can do it.

quotes.author: Aristotle
quotes.text: Quality is not an act, it is a habit.

quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt
quotes.text: With the new day comes new strength and new thoughts.

quotes.author: Ralph Marston
quotes.text: What you do today can improve all your tomorrows.

quotes.author: Samuel Beckett
quotes.text: Ever tried. Ever failed. No matter. Try Again. Fail again. Fail better.

quotes.author: Arthur Ashe
quotes.text: Start where you are. Use what you have. Do what you can.

quotes.author: Lao Tzu
quotes.text: Do the difficult things while they are easy and do the great things while they are small. A journey of a thousand miles must begin with a single step.

quotes.author: George S. Patton
quotes.text: A good plan violently executed now is better than a perfect plan executed next week.

quotes.author: Mark Twain
quotes.text: The secret of getting ahead is getting started.

quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt
quotes.text: Keep your eyes on the stars, and your feet on the ground.

quotes.author: Pope John XXIII
quotes.text: Consult not your fears but your hopes and your dreams. Think not about your frustrations, but about your unfulfilled potential. Concern yourself not with what you tried and failed in, but with what it is still possible for you to do.

quotes.author: H. G. Wells
quotes.text: If you fell down yesterday, stand up today.

quotes.author: Tony Robbins
quotes.text: Setting goals is the first step in turning the invisible into the visible.

quotes.author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam
quotes.text: We should not give up and we should not allow the problem to defeat us.

quotes.author: Og Mandino
quotes.text: Always do your best. What you plant now, you will harvest later.

quotes.author: Jim Rohn
quotes.text: Either you run the day or the day runs you.

quotes.author: William James
quotes.text: Begin to be now what you will be hereafter.

quotes.author: Sam Levenson
quotes.text: Don't watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.

quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe
quotes.text: Knowing is not enough; we must apply. Willing is not enough; we must do.

quotes.author: Bo Jackson
quotes.text: Set your goals high, and don't stop till you get there.

quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin
quotes.text: Well done is better than well said.

quotes.author: Rabindranath Tagore
quotes.text: You can't cross the sea merely by standing and staring at the water.

quotes.author: W. Clement Stone
quotes.text: Aim for the moon. If you miss, you may hit a star.

quotes.author: Benjamin Disraeli
quotes.text: Never complain and never explain.

quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt
quotes.text: When you reach the end of your rope, tie a knot in it and hang on.

quotes.author: Leo Buscaglia
quotes.text: Your talent is God's gift to you. What you do with it is your gift back to God.

quotes.author: Walter Elliot
quotes.text: Perseverance is not a long race; it is many short races one after the other.

quotes.author: Aldous Huxley
quotes.text: There is only one corner of the universe you can be certain of improving, and that's your own self.

quotes.author: Dalai Lama
quotes.text: Be kind whenever possible. It is always possible.

quotes.author: Maya Angelou
quotes.text: We may encounter many defeats but we must not be defeated.

quotes.author: Bradley Whitford
quotes.text: Infuse your life with action. Don't wait for it to happen. Make it happen. Make your own future. Make your own hope. Make your own love. And whatever your beliefs, honor your creator, not by passively waiting for grace to come down from upon high, but by doing what you can to make grace happen... yourself, right now, right down here on Earth.

quotes.author: Zig Ziglar
quotes.text: What you get by achieving your goals is not as important as what you become by achieving your goals.

quotes.author: Nikos Kazantzakis
quotes.text: In order to succeed, we must first believe that we can.

quotes.author: Unknown
quotes.text: The past cannot be changed. The future is yet in your power.

quotes.author: John F. Kennedy
quotes.text: Things do not happen. Things are made to happen.

quotes.author: Les Brown
quotes.text: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.

quotes.author: Ayn Rand
quotes.text: A creative man is motivated by the desire to achieve, not by the desire to beat others.

quotes.author: Ken Venturi
quotes.text: I don't believe you have to be better than everybody else. I believe you have to be better than you ever thought you could be.

quotes.author: Robert H. Schuller
quotes.text: Problems are not stop signs, they are guidelines.

quotes.author: Horace
quotes.text: Don't think, just do.

quotes.author: Epictetus
quotes.text: The key is to keep company only with people who uplift you, whose presence calls forth your best.

quotes.author: Wayne Dyer
quotes.text: Be miserable. Or motivate yourself. Whatever has to be done, it's always your choice.

quotes.author: Pauline Kael
quotes.text: Where there is a will, there is a way. If there is a chance in a million that you can do something, anything, to keep what you want from ending, do it. Pry the door open or, if need be, wedge your foot in that door and keep it open.

quotes.author: Carol Burnett
quotes.text: Only I can change my life. No one can do it for me.

quotes.author: Simone de Beauvoir
quotes.text: Change your life today. Don't gamble on the future, act now, without delay.

quotes.author: Don Miguel Ruiz
quotes.text: Be Impeccable With Your Word. Speak with integrity. Say only what you mean. Avoid using the word to speak against yourself or to gossip about others. Use the power of your word in the direction of truth and love.

quotes.author: Amelia Earhart
quotes.text: The most effective way to do it, is to do it.

quotes.author: Harriet Beecher Stowe
quotes.text: Never give up, for that is just the place and time that the tide will turn.

quotes.author: Kyle Chandler
quotes.text: Opportunity does not knock, it presents itself when you beat down the door.

quotes.author: Stephen Hawking
quotes.text: Look up at the stars and not down at your feet. Try to make sense of what you see, and wonder about what makes the universe exist. Be curious.

quotes.author: Muhammad Iqbal
quotes.text: The ultimate aim of the ego is not to see something, but to be something.
